amendment.description: To propose a substitute to the preamble.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3678 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3678 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR 9/24/2004 S9654-9655) To propose a substitute to the preamble.
